sourcesContent:
export default function AboutMe() { return (

About

About Me

My Name is Kurstie.

Lemme tell you a little bit about myself. I have been attending the UNC Fullstack Web Developer Bootcamp. I have been learning a lot about HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, MongoDB, and React. I have been enjoying the process of learning and creating new things. I am excited to see what the future holds for me. I am excited to see what I can create and what I can learn in the future.

); }
